scripts.build: rimraf dist && microbundle src/{index,body,header}.jsx src/hooks.js --jsx jsx --jsxImportSource react --globals react/jsx-runtime=jsx --css-modules='-cm_[md5:hash:hex:8]' -f modern --compress false
scripts.dev: rimraf dist && microbundle watch src/{index,body,header}.jsx src/hooks.js --jsx jsx --jsxImportSource react --globals react/jsx-runtime=jsx --css-modules='-cm_[path][name]__[local]__[md5:hash:hex:6]' -f modern --compress false
